rules_text:
When AOSE Field Biologist enters, target player mills a number of cards equal to its power.
Eternalize {2}{B}{B} [i]({2}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a 4/4 black Zombie Human Scout with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)[/i]
